summary: A level 50 Argonian can be found in the Blue Palace in Solitude on the top floor, this follower is not OP and is lore friendly. Can be found in Blue Palace in Solitude, the top floor.
descriptionHtml:
Argonian:
Level 50
Comes with glass armor, not much to say about.
I set it so all his perks are at 0, so you can make this any kind of follower you want, a mage, warrior, anything. He comes with Glass armor, Glass sword, and Sparks on his left hand. Health is 150, his magicka is 10000, and his stamina is 30. His speed is only 70.
author: DarkShadowBrute
